divs: Sighting Detailsdiamond like or star like. friend called to say what he was seeing in the sky, i went out side to look at them. the time was around 11:00 am when i first saw, then noticed an erregular flight pattern, father saw the same thing, all of us are a couple of blocks from each other. they made u-turns and zig zags. to surreal to have feelings about what we saw. none of us were excited. after a half hour the ufo's vanished into the clouds. sorry, no pics.
Summary: circling in sky near sun, going east and west almost straight up in sky.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Riverdale Park
This sighting has never been favorited.
